articles.content:
14th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Cup to Be Held 
    Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The 14th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Cup will be held here from February 15 to 17 on the occasion of the auspicious February holiday.
 The festival will draw excellent figure skaters from the DPRK and other countries who will make exhibition performances.    
 It will prove to be a significant sports festival as it will reflect the unanimous aspiration and desire of all people to celebrate the birthday of leader   Kim Jong Il, the great sun of the 21st century, as a holiday common to humankind.

articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter and Gift to Kim Jong Il from China 
    Beijing, January 27 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory letter and a gift by the China Association for International Friendly Contact and the Beijing Association for International Friendly Contact in their joint name on the occasion of his birthday (February 16).
 The congratulatory letter and gift were handed to DPRK Ambassador to China Choe Jin Su by the vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact on Jan. 27.

articles.title: Great National Unity Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Latin American and Caribbean Regional Preparatory Committee Formed 
    Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Preparatory Committee for the "meeting praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu" was formed on Jan. 13 through a telephone meeting of progressive figures of regional organizations, organizations for supporting Korea�fs reunification and friendly organizations in Peru, Ecuador, Venezuela and Brazil.
 Chairman of the Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea Gilberto Zapata Isaza was elected chairman of the preparatory committee, Chairman of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship Angel Castro Lavarello vice-chairman of the preparatory committee and Chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea�fs Independent and Peaceful Reunification Fabian Guerrero secretary general of the preparatory committee at the meeting.    
 It discussed the issues of widely introducing the immortal feats of the great persons of Mt. Paektu on various occasions including the Day of the Sun and the February holiday to create a regional atmosphere for the success of the "meeting praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu" and positively support it.

articles.content:
Functions Held in Czech Republic and Bulgaria
    Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The fifth-term conference of the south Korean Reunification Solidarity was reportedly held in Seoul on Jan. 24 at which the organization discussed its action program for achieving great national unity.
 A special resolution adopted at the conference called for making positive efforts to implement the June 15 joint declaration and taking the lead in the campaign for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops and the abolition of the "National Security Law".    
 Honorary representatives, permanent representative chairman and permanent representatives were elected there.
